next.title: Users: Managing the Projects of a User

title: Users: Importing Users
body:
Users: Importing Users¶

You should have navigated to the pop-up tab to add a new user. If you are having trouble getting to this point, refer to Adding a New User
This option for adding new users should be used when the users’ information is stored elsewhere and you would like to transfer it into the Maha Platform.
You can import users from your own spreadsheet or you can download a template and upload it with the data.

  1. Click Import Users

  2. Click Start New Input to upload an existing spreadsheet

    • Upload the spreadsheet

  3. Click CSV or XLSX to download a template that can be uploaded with the above steps

  4. Click Save
